title: HubSpot Setup Assistant
description: Floating assistant panel that guides you through HubSpot onboarding with pre-filled data from your setup wizard

steps.title: Business Profile
steps.description: We're filling in your business details so HubSpot tailors your workspace
steps.content:
**We're filling in your business details so HubSpot tailors your workspace.**

**Fields we're autofilling:**
‚Ä¢ Company name
‚Ä¢ Website/domain
‚Ä¢ Company size

**What's happening:**
We're using the information you provided in our setup wizard to pre-populate HubSpot's business profile form. This ensures your workspace is configured correctly from the start.

steps.title: Connect Your Website
steps.description: We're adding your domain and getting you ready for tracking and forms
steps.content:
**We're adding your domain and getting you ready for tracking and forms.**

**What we're doing:**
‚Ä¢ Adding your domain to HubSpot
‚Ä¢ Generating DNS records for verification
‚Ä¢ Preparing tracking setup

**DNS Instructions:**
1. Log in to your domain provider (GoDaddy, Namecheap, etc.)
2. Add a TXT record:
   - Name: `{{dns_name}}`
   - Value: `{{dns_value}}`
3. Save and wait 5-10 minutes for propagation

**Need help?** We can generate step-by-step instructions for your specific domain provider.

spotlight.message: üåê We've filled in your domain. Follow the DNS instructions in the panel to complete verification.

steps.title: Install Tracking Pixel
steps.description: Copy this pixel and paste it into your site's head tag. We'll check when it's live.
steps.content:
**Copy this pixel and paste it into your site's head tag. We'll check when it's live.**

**What to do:**
1. Copy the tracking code from HubSpot
2. Add it to your website's `<head>` section
3. Save and publish your site
4. We'll automatically verify the installation

**Tracking Code:**
```html
<script type="text/javascript" id="hs-script-loader" async defer src="//js.hs-scripts.com/{{portal_id}}.js"></script>
```

**Status:** {{tracking_status}}

spotlight.message: üìã Click 'Copy' to copy the tracking code, then add it to your website's head section.

steps.content:
**We set your default dashboard to Sales (you can change this anytime).**

**What this means:**
‚Ä¢ Your home screen will show sales-focused widgets
‚Ä¢ Quick access to deals, contacts, and activities

**Available Dashboards:**

‚Ä¢ **Marketing:** Campaigns, leads, analytics

**Next Steps:**
Your HubSpot workspace is now configured! You can start using it immediately or explore additional features.
